events: Lost their sibling Erkenradis when Amelgeir was 5 and Erkenradis was 4.
Lost father at the age of 5
Lost their child Gheesen when Gheesen was 2 years old.
Lost their sibling Gheesen when Amelgeir was 21 and Gheesen was 22.
Lost their sibling Suam when Amelgeir was 23 and Suam was 29.
Lost their child Gloria when Gloria was 5 years old.
Lost mother at the age of 24
Lost wife Gisele when she gave birth to Stemaers.
Lost their child Stemaers when Stemaers was 3 years old.
